description: Students study topics related to the environment. Topics vary from year to year at the discretion of the instructor. Topics may include Environment and Theology, Environmental Justice, Ecotourism, and Literature of the Poles. Class is largely discussion-based but may include a lab/fieldwork component depending on the topic. May be repeated if topic is different. Offered annually.
name: Top: Mixed Methods Enviro Analysis
notes: Full topic title: Mixed Methods for Environmental Analysis
Prerequisite: ENVST 137 or equivalent. It will count flexibly as either a
social science or natural science elective for the major or concentration.
